thread.title: Ex-Inter Allies coach Paa Kwesi Fabian backs Herbert Addo to excel on return
thread.title_full: Ex-Inter Allies coach Paa Kwesi Fabian backs Herbert Addo to excel on return

title: Ex-Inter Allies coach Paa Kwesi Fabian backs Herbert Addo to excel on return
text:
18:55 CET Ex-Inter Allies coach Paa Kwesi Fabian backs Herbert Addo to excel on return - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Ex-Inter Allies coach Paa Kwesi Fabian has backed Herbert Addo to excel on his return to the club. 
Addo, a veteran Ghanaian trainer signed a two-year deal with the Tema-based side this week after leaving Hearts of Oak. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
